resources.string: What do you want to scan?
There is no paid version of the app or any extra features to buy. It also has no ads. If you want to support me, you can do it here:
Â©2020 ScanSmart is created by Dimitris Ripis. All rights reserved.

ScanSmart is a free application that scans barcodes (including Wifi barcodes) and extracts information from photos. I would appreciate it if you could send suggestions or report to me any problems you had using it.
